trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> objects inside <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>.
Represents the contents of the wst:Claims element.
This optional element requests the set of specific claim types requested by the client.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection.Dialect%2A> property specifies dialect of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> objects in the collection.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection"></xref> class.

After initialization, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection> is empty and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection.Dialect%2A> property is set to "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity".
Gets or sets the Dialect attribute.
Represents the Dialect attribute of the wst:Claims element.
This required attribute contains a URI that indicates the syntax used to specify the set of requested claims.
A string that contains the URI that identifies the dialect.

The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSIdentity.WSIdentityConstants.Dialect"></xref>, which indicates that <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> objects in the collection correspond to the Information Card profile.
